languages.text: {n}Старик впивается обломанными ногтями в подгнивший ящик.{/n} "Я слышал звук твоих шагов: добротная подошва приятно скрипит по металлу. Шагаешь уверенно. У тебя все есть, не отбирай последнее у того, кто и так ничего не имеет".

{n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик впивается обломанными ногтями в подгнивший ящик.{/n} "Я слышал звук твоих шагов: добротная подошва приятно скрипит по металлу. Шагаешь уверенно. У тебя все есть, не отбирай последнее у того, кто и так ничего не имеет".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted box.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing on the ear. Your gait is confident. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from one who has all but nothing."

{n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted box.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing on the ear. Your gait is confident. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from one who has all but nothing."

You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."

{n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."

languages.text: {n}El anciano clava sus uñas rotas en la caja podrida.{/n} «He oído el sonido de tus pisadas. El crujido de tus suelas de calidad contra el metal es agradable. Caminas con confianza. Tienes todo lo que necesitas. No le quites a este pobre viejo lo poco que tiene».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano clava sus uñas rotas en la caja podrida.{/n} «He oído el sonido de tus pisadas. El crujido de tus suelas de calidad contra el metal es agradable. Caminas con confianza. Tienes todo lo que necesitas. No le quites a este pobre viejo lo poco que tiene».

languages.text: {n}老人は欠けた爪を腐った木箱に食い込ませる。{/n}「あなた様の足音が聞こえました。金属に当たる精巧に作られた靴底のきしむ音は耳に心地いい。自信に満ちた足音です。必要なものはすべてお持ちだ。何も持たないこの老人から、すべてを奪うのは、やめてくだされ」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は欠けた爪を腐った木箱に食い込ませる。{/n}「あなた様の足音が聞こえました。金属に当たる精巧に作られた靴底のきしむ音は耳に心地いい。自信に満ちた足音です。必要なものはすべてお持ちだ。何も持たないこの老人から、すべてを奪うのは、やめてくだされ」

languages.text: {n}老人将残破的指甲伸进朽烂的板条箱里。{/n}“我听到了你的脚步声，那是做工精良的鞋底和金属摩擦发出的嘎吱声，听起来很悦耳。你的步伐充满自信，你已经拥有了你所需要的一切。而我，我是个一无所有的老人，不要夺走我最后的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人将残破的指甲伸进朽烂的板条箱里。{/n}“我听到了你的脚步声，那是做工精良的鞋底和金属摩擦发出的嘎吱声，听起来很悦耳。你的步伐充满自信，你已经拥有了你所需要的一切。而我，我是个一无所有的老人，不要夺走我最后的东西。”

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann gräbt seine abgebrochenen Fingernägel in die verrottete Kiste.{/n} "Ich habe Eure Schritte gehört. Das Quietschen Eurer edlen Sohlen auf dem Metall klingt angenehm. Ihr geht selbstbewusst. Ihr habt alles, was Ihr braucht. Nehmt diesem alten Mann, der nichts hat, nicht alles weg."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann gräbt seine abgebrochenen Fingernägel in die verrottete Kiste.{/n} "Ich habe Eure Schritte gehört. Das Quietschen Eurer edlen Sohlen auf dem Metall klingt angenehm. Ihr geht selbstbewusst. Ihr habt alles, was Ihr braucht. Nehmt diesem alten Mann, der nichts hat, nicht alles weg."

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme enfonce ses ongles cassés dans la caisse moisie.{/n} « J'ai entendu le bruit de vos pas. Le frottement de vos semelles de bonne facture contre le métal est doux à l'oreille. Votre démarche est assurée. Vous avez tout ce dont vous avez besoin. Ne prenez pas tout à celui qui n'a rien. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme enfonce ses ongles cassés dans la caisse moisie.{/n} « J'ai entendu le bruit de vos pas. Le frottement de vos semelles de bonne facture contre le métal est doux à l'oreille. Votre démarche est assurée. Vous avez tout ce dont vous avez besoin. Ne prenez pas tout à celui qui n'a rien. »

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam, eciş bücüş tırnaklarını çürümüş kasaya geçiriyor.{/n} "Ayak seslerinizi işittim. Kaliteli tabanların metal üzerindeki gıcırtısı, kulağa pek hoş geliyor. Adımlarınızda öz güven var. İhtiyacınız olan her şeye sahipsiniz. Hiçbir şeyi olmayan bu ihtiyar adamın elindekileri almayın."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man sinks his chipped fingernails into the rotted crate.{/n} "I heard the sound of your footsteps. The creak of your well-made soles against the metal is pleasing to the ear. You walk with confidence. You have everything you need. Don't take everything from this old man who has nothing."
